name: Dark Music Stand (Planning Center)
description:
For those of us musicians that use a laptop on stage instead of a tablet for tabs/notes while playing worship music, you're going to want this. If your lights team needs to do a black out mode, it'll help prevent you from still being illuminated while on stage. Plus, it'll save your eyes.

I hope it comes in handy! Blessings!
additional_info:
Please use a modern browser. This style leverages the css attribute "filter" which is not supported on ie11. If you're using ie11, first of all please please please stop it. I value your safety and quality of life and ie11 won't help you achieve that anymore.

Chrome, Edge and FireFox are great browsers. Use those instead. Happy playing!
